item.title: On the Trail of the Lost with Andrea Lankford
item.description: Andrea Lankford returns! We last spoke with the author of Ranger Confidential last year, but today she is back to discuss her new book Trail of the Lost: The Relentless Search to Bring Home the Missing Hikers of the Pacific Crest Trail. The book outlines the stories of missing hikers Chris Sylvia, David O'Sullivan and Kris Fowler, their families and the lengths they (and complete strangers) have gone to find them... Feed: https://audioboom.com/channels/5055896.rss

item.title: Shako, Donnie Darko, and a Medical Journal From Hell
item.description: When was the last time your blood ran cold with a horrific tale of a nearly invincible, murderous polar bear? Hold on to your seats as we traverse the icy terrors of the 2000 AD universe with Shako. This fearsome creature's gruesome adventures had comic readers' hearts pounding in 1977 and still makes for a chilling tale today. With each unnerving detail, we unravel Shako's icy reign of terror, from bewildering alliances to gritty confrontations and staggering kill counts... Feed: https://darklongbox.podbean.com/feed.xml
